languages.text: "Это имя довольно точно отражает мою сущность. Это имя мне дал Гипаэраль, архонт кабала Отрезанного языка. Он был хорошим владыкой, хорошо знал своих слуг, а потому не доверял ни одному из них и доверил мне честь охранять его".

"The name is an accurate reflection of my nature, more or less. It was given to me by Gipaeral, Archon of the Kabal of the Sheared Tongue. He was a competent master and he knew his servants well, which is why he didn't trust any of them and gave me the honour of guarding him."
languages.original_text: "Это имя довольно точно отражает мою сущность. Это имя мне дал Гипаэраль, архонт кабала Отрезанного языка. Он был хорошим владыкой, хорошо знал своих слуг, а потому не доверял ни одному из них и доверил мне честь охранять его".

traits.locale_text: "The name is an accurate reflection of my nature, more or less. My race does not place stock in names — I have changed mine many times. This name was given to me by Gipaeral, Archon of the Kabal of the Sheared Tongue. He was a good master and he knew his servants well, which is why he didn't trust any of them and gave me the honour of guarding him."

"The name is an accurate reflection of my nature, more or less. My race does not place stock in names — I have changed mine many times. This name was given to me by Gipaeral, Archon of the Kabal of the Sheared Tongue. He was a good master and he knew his servants well, which is why he didn't trust any of them and gave me the honour of guarding him."

"The name is an accurate reflection of my nature, more or less. My race does not place stock in names — I have changed mine many times. This name was given to me by Gipaeral, Archon of the Kabal of the Sheared Tongue. He was a good master and he knew his servants well, which is why he didn't trust any of them and gave me the honour of guarding him."

"The name is an accurate reflection of my nature, more or less. It was given to me by Gipaeral, Archon of the Kabal of the Sheared Tongue. He was a competent master and he knew his servants well, which is why he didn't trust any of them and gave me the honour of guarding him."

languages.text: “这个名字或多或少地反应了我的本性。赐予我这个名字的人，是断舌阴谋团的执政官吉帕拉尔。他是位称职的主人，也很了解他的仆人。正因如此，他并不相信他的手下，而是将守护人身安全这一光荣使命赐予了我。”
languages.original_text: "The name is an accurate reflection of my nature, more or less. It was given to me by Gipaeral, Archon of the Kabal of the Sheared Tongue. He was a competent master and he knew his servants well, which is why he didn't trust any of them and gave me the honour of guarding him."

traits.locale_text: “这个名字或多或少地反应了我的本性。赐予我这个名字的人，是断舌阴谋团的执政官吉帕拉尔。他是位称职的主人，也很了解他的仆人。正因如此，他并不相信他的手下，而是将守护人身安全这一光荣使命赐予了我。”

languages.text: 「名は体を表すと言うだろう。この名は刈り取られし舌の陰謀団のアーコン、ギパラルが私に授けた。彼は有能な主人であり、従者たちのことをよく知っていたからこそ、従者の誰も信用せず、私に彼を警護する栄誉を与えてくれた」
languages.original_text: "The name is an accurate reflection of my nature, more or less. It was given to me by Gipaeral, Archon of the Kabal of the Sheared Tongue. He was a competent master and he knew his servants well, which is why he didn't trust any of them and gave me the honour of guarding him."

traits.locale_text: 「名は体を表すと言うだろう。この名は刈り取られし舌の陰謀団のアーコン、ギパラルが私に授けた。彼は有能な主人であり、従者たちのことをよく知っていたからこそ、従者の誰も信用せず、私に彼を警護する栄誉を与えてくれた」

languages.text: «Ese nombre representa bien mi naturaleza, en mi opinión. Me lo otorgó Gipaeral, Arconte de la Kábala de la Lengua Segada. Era un maestro competente y conocía bien a sus sirvientes, por lo que no confiaba en ninguno de ellos y me concedió el honor de protegerle».
languages.original_text: "The name is an accurate reflection of my nature, more or less. It was given to me by Gipaeral, Archon of the Kabal of the Sheared Tongue. He was a competent master and he knew his servants well, which is why he didn't trust any of them and gave me the honour of guarding him."

traits.locale_text: «Ese nombre representa bien mi naturaleza, en mi opinión. Me lo otorgó Gipaeral, Arconte de la Kábala de la Lengua Segada. Era un maestro competente y conocía bien a sus sirvientes, por lo que no confiaba en ninguno de ellos y me concedió el honor de protegerle».

languages.text: « Ce nom reflète plus ou moins ma nature. Je le dois à Gipaéral, archonte de la Kabale de la Langue Coupée. C'était un maître compétent qui connaissait suffisamment ses serviteurs pour savoir qu'il ne pouvait pas leur faire confiance. C'est pour cette raison que j'avais l'honneur de le protéger. »
languages.original_text: "The name is an accurate reflection of my nature, more or less. It was given to me by Gipaeral, Archon of the Kabal of the Sheared Tongue. He was a competent master and he knew his servants well, which is why he didn't trust any of them and gave me the honour of guarding him."

traits.locale_text: « Ce nom reflète plus ou moins ma nature. Je le dois à Gipaéral, archonte de la Kabale de la Langue Coupée. C'était un maître compétent qui connaissait suffisamment ses serviteurs pour savoir qu'il ne pouvait pas leur faire confiance. C'est pour cette raison que j'avais l'honneur de le protéger. »

languages.text: "Der Name ist mehr weniger eine korrekte Beschreibung meiner Natur. Ich erhielt ihn von Gipareal, Archon der Kabale der herausgeschnittenen Zunge. Er war ein fähiger Meister und kannte seine Diener gut, weswegen er auch keinem von ihnen vertraute und mir die Ehre überließ, ihn zu bewachen."
languages.original_text: "The name is an accurate reflection of my nature, more or less. It was given to me by Gipaeral, Archon of the Kabal of the Sheared Tongue. He was a competent master and he knew his servants well, which is why he didn't trust any of them and gave me the honour of guarding him."

traits.locale_text: "Der Name ist mehr weniger eine korrekte Beschreibung meiner Natur. Ich erhielt ihn von Gipareal, Archon der Kabale der herausgeschnittenen Zunge. Er war ein fähiger Meister und kannte seine Diener gut, weswegen er auch keinem von ihnen vertraute und mir die Ehre überließ, ihn zu bewachen."

languages.text: "Çünkü beni olduğum gibi yansıtıyor, yani aşağı yukarı. Adımı, Yarık Dil Kabalı Arkonu Gipaeral koymuştu. Ehil bir üstattı, hizmetkârlarını iyi tanırdı. Bu sebeple hiçbirine güvenmemiş; kendisini koruma görevini bana bahşetmişti."
languages.original_text: "The name is an accurate reflection of my nature, more or less. It was given to me by Gipaeral, Archon of the Kabal of the Sheared Tongue. He was a competent master and he knew his servants well, which is why he didn't trust any of them and gave me the honour of guarding him."

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü beni olduğum gibi yansıtıyor, yani aşağı yukarı. Adımı, Yarık Dil Kabalı Arkonu Gipaeral koymuştu. Ehil bir üstattı, hizmetkârlarını iyi tanırdı. Bu sebeple hiçbirine güvenmemiş; kendisini koruma görevini bana bahşetmişti."
